selection.title: Apply to selection
selection.description: Applies current tokens to current selection (fast!)

page.title: Apply to page
page.description: Applies current tokens to the current page

doc.title: Apply to document
doc.description: Applies current tokens to the whole document (slow!)

onChange.title: Update on change
onChange.description: Applies tokens whenever you make a change (slow!)

remoteJSONBin.title: Update remote
remoteJSONBin.description: Updates JSONBin whenever you make a change

styles.title: Update styles
styles.description: Updates the value of local styles when names match

swapStyles.title: Swap styles
swapStyles.description: Swap themes by just changing styles, requires Themes

setExplanation: Sets allow you to split your tokens up into multiple files. You can activate different sets to control theming.
deleteSetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this set?
